name: Open mold casting, rigid composites part, at plant
description: An average of 0.00049 kg of rigid composite part scrap is produced for every kilogram of open mold casted parts produced; this scrap is sold for recycling.  Complete inventory data and metadata are shown in full in the final report, Life Cycle Inventory of Polymer Composites. The report is not publicly available. This report has been extensively reviewed within Franklin Associates by Rebe Feraldi, Anne Marie Molen, and Melissa Huff and has undergone partial critical review by ACMA members. Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet undergone a formal validation process.  Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Fabrication of rigid composite parts by open mold casting.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data are from primary sources. The composites fabricators who provided data for this module verified that the characteristics of their plants are representative of North American composites fabrication facilities producing open mold casted composite parts. The representativeness of the composites fabrication processes are unknown, but estimated to be less than 10% of the US production volume.

dataGenerator.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

dataDocumentor.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
